mapper.sql: diary_num , mem_id , diary_content , diary_date , diary_updatedate , diary_status
mapper.select: select from diary_table where mem_id=#{mem_id} and diary_status='N' order by diary_num desc limit 5
mapper.insert: insert into diary_table values(diary_num, #{mem_id}, #{diary_content}, now(), now(), 'N')
mapper.update: update diary_table set diary_content=#{diary_content}, diary_updatedate=now() where diary_num=#{diary_num}
update diary_table set diary_status='Y', diary_updatedate=now() where diary_num=#{diary_num}
mapper.select: select from diary_table where diary_date=#{diary_date} and mem_id=#{mem_id} and diary_status ='N' order by diary_num desc
